package.name: dynamixel_controller
package.description:
This repository contains the controller of the aerial manipulator. Two different inverse kinematics position control modes are implemented. In the first control mode the base of the manipulator is fixed and the end effector follows the wand position. In the second control mode the end effector position is set to a fixed position and the base position can be moved.
The torque feedback of the actuators are also implemented in this package. The HEBI X5-4 actuator directly outputs the torque apllied to it. The torque measurement of the Dynamixel-SEA is done by measuring the deflection of the encoder. After filtering and offset correcting the signal, the torque acting on the actuator is estimated.
